name: braillist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who can read and write Braille (= a system of printing for blind people, in which each letter is represented by a raised pattern of dots): The process of taking the students' Braille-written papers and typing them would take hours, even though he was an expert Braillist.
More examplesFewer examplesHe has been a qualified Braillist for almost a year and proof-reads other prisoners' work. We are looking for a certified Braillist to transcribe educational materials for students who are blind and visually impaired. Braillists now use computer software for Braille production.
